definition: to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])

sentences.english: Dear colleagues, a pleasant journey, I remember thinking of us, always come back together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的同事，一路順風，記得想念我們，常回來聚聚。

sentences.english: Which class level would you like to enroll in?
sentences.chinese: 你預定想念哪一個程度的班別？

sentences.english: When you're gone the pieces of my heart are missing you.
sentences.chinese: 你走之後，我的每一片心都在想念你。

sentences.english: I doubt he misses me after our last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 不知上次一別之後他可否想念我。

sentences.english: I do miss you, dear teacher.
sentences.chinese: 敬愛的老師，我真想念您。

sentences.english: Unaccustomed to city life, Susan pined for her native hills and streams.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊過不慣城市生活，非常想念她家鄉的山山水水。

sentences.english: I told him I was happy for him, but I would miss him greatly next year.
sentences.chinese: 我對葉琛說我爲他感到高興，但我明年會很想念他的。

sentences.english: Lee hopes futilely to read aloud children but don'ts think of a wife, make the wife more angry.
sentences.chinese: 李白想念兒女卻不想念妻子，讓妻子更爲惱火。

sentences.english: Lee hopes futilely to read aloud children but don'ts think of a wife, make the wife more angry.
sentences.chinese: 李白想念兒女卻不想念妻子，讓妻子更爲惱火。

sentences.english: This card is to show that we still care.
sentences.chinese: 這張卡片是告訴您，我們仍然想念您。

sentences.english: How are you getting along these days? I miss you very much.
sentences.chinese: 你近來過得如何？我十分想念你。

sentences.english: Only, he thought of Cosette with a pang at his heart.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的心情沉重，想念着珂賽特。

sentences.english: If my missing spurts out, I will not tell you.
sentences.chinese: 如果我的想念噴薄而出，我不會告訴你。

sentences.english: I really miss you, really, please come back to me please?
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想念你，真的，請回到我身邊好嗎？

sentences.english: David missed his wife who had passed away recently.
sentences.chinese: 大衛十分想念自己剛去世的妻子。

sentences.english: You will be dearly missed. I learned so much from apple job exp to life ekp.
sentences.chinese: 我會深深想念你，在蘋果學到了很多。

definition: to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to think of/to long for/to miss
to worry about/to be concerned about
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to recall/to think of/to call to mind
reluctant to part with (sth or sb)/unwilling to let go of
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
